home.title: Create Your Perfect CV in Minutes
home.paragraph: Our AI powered CV maker helps you build a professional CV that stands out and matches job descriptions. Get started for free!

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive interface that guides you through the CV creation process step by step.

professionalTemplates.title: Professional Templates
professionalTemplates.description: Choose from a variety of professionally designed templates to make your CV stand out.

atsFriendly.title: ATS Friendly
atsFriendly.description: Our CVs are optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems to increase your chances of getting an interview.

aiPoweredCustomization.title: AI Powered Customization
aiPoweredCustomization.description: Our AI tailors your CV to match specific job descriptions, improving your chances of landing interviews.

mockJobDescription.title: Job Description
mockJobDescription.k1: Develop and enhance B2B SaaS products
mockJobDescription.i2: Proficient in TypeScript, React, Tailwind, GraphQL
